channel.title: CVE Feed for PILZ -- PASvisu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PILZ -- PASvisu

item.title: CVE-2022-40977|2024-08-03T12:28:42.959Z -- pilz -- pasvisu
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability was discovered in Pilz PASvisu Server before 1.12.0. An unauthenticated remote attacker could use a zipped, malicious configuration file to trigger arbitrary file writes ('zip-slip'). File writes do not affect confidentiality or availability.
